content: Water collector system DD-WMK-BL ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Drill stand mounted water collectors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Enables clean drilling overhead Collect up to 100% of slurry Applications Can be used with the WMS 100 water management system or a vacuum cleaner Should be used with water collector holders Should be fixed to a drill stand ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Water collector systems Product information: Set of accessories to collect water with DD 200, DD 350 and DD 500 For use with: DD 200, DD 250, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA Technical Data | Accessory type | Water collector systems | Product information | Set of accessories to collect water with DD 200, DD 350 and DD 500 | For use with | DD 200, DD 250, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA | Additional Accessory Information | Set of accessories to collect water with DD 250, DD 350 and DD 500 ### ITEMS- 2040916 - Water collector system DD-WMK-BL - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD-WH 3/4 drain hose - 1x DD-HD30-WCH Water collector holder assy - 1x DD-WC-ML Water dam - 1x DD-WC-SM Water dam - 1x 50 Connecting piece - 1x DD-WMK-BL Tool case assy
